refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: A revnumber identifies the revision number of a document. The revision number should uniquely identify a particular revision of a document.
Formatted inline. DocBook does not require that revnumbers be sequential or make any demands on their format. They can be numeric, alphanumeric, or whatever suits your needs.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.para: See revhistory for an example that uses this element.
